trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Ottawa
There were no other sightings in Ottawa on or around December 23rd 2007
Summary: Arc of lights, golf ball at arms length.
divs: Sighting DetailsLooked out my window to look at a shimmering star, when i saw lights white and red maybe blue also, huvering slowly towards the right, i picked up my binoculars to get a better look at it, i couldnt get it with the binocs, when i put them down i was startled as it was now moving towards me, it was moving too slowly and had turned too sharp for a plane, i saw its lights as it flew over me, much faster, so as must have accelerated, but i missed the acceleration trying to see it with binoculars, the lights were in an arc maybe a circle, this was no helicopter, as it flew over it made a loud loud humming, with a less loud jet noise. Arc of lights maybe a circle as it flew over and revealed its rear light. Actualy larger then a golf ball at arms length. Feeling of a powerful gravity craft was my feeling of it. ps it is now an hour later as I type this at 12:25, and that shimmering lstar, wich has been moving all over the sky over time, is still moving about and shimmering, possibly a satelite i suppose. Note first observed south-west-south, last ovserved VERTICAL.
